After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.EXPLANATION: Total number of requests for on-site repair services received within a specified period, reflecting service demand.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.FORMULA: Total Number of On-Site Repair Requests

After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to respond to on-site repair requests from the moment the request is received until service is initiated.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.FORMULA: Average Time from On-Site Repair Request to Response

After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the quality, timeliness, and effectiveness of on-site repair services, gathered through post-service surveys.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding On-Site Repairs

After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for each on-site repair incident, including labor, parts, and administrative expenses.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.FORMULA: Total Cost of On-Site Repairs / Total Number of On-Site Repair Incidents

After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.EXPLANATION: Percentage of on-site repair requests that are completed successfully compared to the total number of requests received.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.FORMULA: (Number of Completed On-Site Repairs / Total Number of On-Site Repair Requests) * 100

After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.KPIS: ROI (Return on Investment) from on-site repairs.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from providing on-site repair services compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.FORMULA: (Net Benefits from On-Site Repairs / Total Cost of On-Site Repairs) * 100

After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.EXPLANATION: Percentage of on-site repair incidents that are resolved satisfactorily compared to the total number of incidents.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.FORMULA: (Number of Resolved On-Site Repair Incidents / Total Number of On-Site Repair Incidents) * 100

After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.KPIS: Compliance with on-site repair service standards.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.EXPLANATION: Degree to which on-site repair services meet established service standards and quality expectations, measured through audits and performance evaluations.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+On-Site.FORMULA: (Number of On-Site Repairs Complying with Standards / Total Number of On-Site Repairs) * 100
